attributes.action: That consideration we given to the removal of Sir Philip Green's Knighthood.
attributes.background: Sir Philip Green treated M.P.s questions in a wholly disrespectful manner ,his answers were evasive and lacked credibility. He said the BHS pension fund was "sortable" but brought no proposals to the meeting. I feel serious consideration be given to the removing his knighthood

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
